Class ZeroException

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, MathThrowable
    public class ZeroException
extends MathIllegalNumberException
    Exception to be thrown when zero is provided where it is not allowed.
    Since:
    2.2
